title:
The title of the tool.
{{Optional}}
changelog: Label of link to the page about RTRC software updates.
clear:
Button to clear (or reset) a particular input field.
{{Identical|Clear}}
close:
Button to close the change preview.
{{Identical|Close}}
currentedit: Example text in the legend to show what a currently selected edit looks like
cvn-adder:
Label of the user that added this item to the CVN database
{{Identical|Adder}}
cvn-reason:
Label of the comment left by the user who added this item to the CVN database.
{{Identical|Reason}}
documentation:
Label of the link to the documentation page.
{{Identical|Documentation}}
filter-hideliu:
Label of the checkbox to hide changes by registered (or logged-in) users. Enabling this results in showing changes by anonymous users only.
{{Identical|Registered user}}
filter-hidebots:
Label of the checkbox to hide changes marked as bot edits.
{{Identical|$1_bots}}
helpicon-tooltip: Tooltip for the Help questionmark icon.
legend:
Label of the legend at the bottom of the list of changes.
{{Identical|Legend}}
limit:
Label of dropdown menu for changing how many results to show (maximum).
{{Identical|Limit}}
masspatrol: Label for button to enable or disable [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/User:Krinkle/Tools/Real-Time_Recent_Changes#MassPatrol MassPatrol]. This feature blindly marks all edits in the feed as patrolled (e.g. to patrolled edits by a specific user).
masspatrol-requires-userfilter:
Informing the user that MassPatrol has been disabled when the user clears the user filter (or when there was no user filter to begin with)

* {{msg-intuition|rtrc-masspatrol}}
months: Comma-separated list of the 12 different months in a year
mypatrollog: Label of the link to your patrol log
namespace:
Label of dropdown menu for filtering by namespace.
{{Identical|Namespace}}
navtoggle-tooltip: Tooltip for the icon that toggles the MediaWiki sidebar
nomatches: Placeholder text in place of the changes list when the query returned no results
order:
Section label for the sort order radio buttons.
{{Identical|Order}}
ores-damaging-probability:
Tooltip displayed to indicate the chances that this edit damaged the page (based on robot assessment from [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/ORES ORES]).
* $1 - Percentage
pause:
Label of the button that pauses or resumes the automatic updating of the list of changes.
{{Identical|Pause}}
permalink: Label of the permalink that will start RTRC with the current settings
reload-interval: Label of the number input field that controls how often the application reloads the changes feed (in seconds).
select-placeholder-none:
Placeholder in a dropdown menu representing the blank option.
{{Identical|None}}
showAnonOnly:
Label of the checkbox to only show changes by anonymous users.
{{Identical|Anon only}}
showUnpatrolledOnly: Label of the checkbox to only show unpatrolled changes
skippededit: Example text in the legend to show what a skipped edit looks like
tag:
Label of the dropdown menu for filtering by change tag.
{{Identical|Tag}}
time-from:
Label of input field containing the start date of the time range filter.
{{Identical|From}}
time-untill:
Label of input field containing the end date of the time range filter
{{Identical|Until}}
type:
Section label for the change type checkboxes.
{{Identical|Type}}
